column4: This program I'm trying to compile says I need the "libvorbisfile (vorbis-devel rpm package)" package, but i'm looking in the repository and there's a LOT of stuff about vorbisu... which should i download???
but for a server I would almost recommend sticking to the LTS.. life is easier that way =)
ok guess ill just stick with 8.04 LTS
you'll get secrurity updates... otherwise things will stay the same.. ie all scripts you wrote will still work, things will be named the same etc.. stability is important for a server
